text:
@realDonaldTrump @Varneyco speaking of pizza, perhaps you haven't heard, your pal herman cain just died from contracting the "hoax" coronavirus after attending your tulsa rally blunder without wearing a face mask.

but sure, g'on promote a new york slice, maybe add an extra topping of hydroxychloroquine?
